quote: एक मूर्ख खुद को बुद्धिमान समझता है, लेकिन एक बुद्धिमान व्यक्ति खुद को मूर्ख समझता है.
name: विलियम शेक्सपीयर

quote: An overflow of good converts to bad
name: William Shakespeare

quote: जैसे शरारती बच्चों के लिए मक्खियाँ होती हैं,वैसे ही God के लिए हम होते हैं; वो अपने मनोरंजन के लिए हमें मारते हैं.
name: विलियम शेक्सपीयर

quote: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: एक मिनट देर से आने से अछ्छा है तीन घंटे पहले आएं.
name: विलियम शेक्सपीयर

quote: No legacy is so rich as honesty
name: William Shakespeare

quote: मैं महंगे कपडे खरीदता हूँ. बस वो मेरे ऊपर सस्ते दीखते हैं
name: वॉरेन बफे

quote: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: Why join the navy if you can be a pirate?
name: Steve Jobs

quote: आप कस्टमर से यह नहीं पूछ सकते कि वो क्या चाहते हैं और फिर उन्हें वो बना के दें.आप जब तक उसे बनायेंगे तब तक वो कुछ नया चाहने लगेंगे.
name: स्टीव जॉब्स

quote: कभी-कभी ज़िन्दगी आपके सर पर ईंट से वार करेगी. अपना विश्वास मत खोइए.
name: स्टीव जॉब्स

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: सदैव संदेह करने वाले व्यक्ति के लिए प्रसन्नता ना इस लोक में  है ना ही कहीं और
name: श्री कृष्ण

quote: Hell has three gates: lust, anger, and greed.
name: Shree Krishna

quote: There is nothing lost or wasted in this life.
name: Shree Krishna

quote: As far as the public is concerned, India is amazingly secular
name: Shahrukh Khan

quote: I don’t believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: मुझे लगता है कि तैयारी और अवसार का मिलन ही भाग्य है.
name: ओपरा विनफ्रे

quote: I still have my feet on the ground, I just wear better shoes.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: सब कुछ आपका हो सकता है.बस सब कुछ एक बार में ही आपका नहीं हो सकता.
name: ओपरा विनफ्रे

quote: शिक्षा सबसे शशक्त हथियार है जिससे दुनिया को बदला जा सकता है.
name: नेल्सन मंडेला

quote: दोस्ती कुछ ऐसा नहीं है जो आप स्कूल में सीखते है। लेकिन यदि आपने दोस्ती का मतलब नहीं सीखा तो दरअसल आपने कुछ नहीं सीखा।
name: मुहम्मद अली

quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
name: Heraclitus

quote: और, जब  आप  कुछ  चाहते  हैं तो पूरा  ब्रह्माण्ड  उसे  हांसिल  करने  के  लिए  आपके  मदद  की  साजिश  करता  है.
name: पाओलो कोएलो

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
name: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: ये  सपने  के  सच  होने  की  सम्भावना  है  जो  जीवन  को  रोचक  बनाती  है.
name: पाओलो कोएलो

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: किसी  से  प्यार  किया  जाता  है  क्योंकि उससे  प्यार  किया  जाता  है. प्यार  करने  के  लिए  किसी  कारण  की  आवश्यकता  नहीं  होती.
name: पाओलो कोएलो

quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: हालांकि, जीवन  का  रहस्य   सात  बार  गिरना  और  आठ  बार  उठना  है.
name: पाओलो कोएलो

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: जो  कोई  भी  इस  उम्मीद  में  प्यार  कर  रहा  है  कि  बदले  में  प्यार  मिले  , वो  अपना  समय  बर्वाद  कर  रहा  है.
name: पाओलो कोएलो

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: दुःख व्यक्ति का साहस ख़त्म कर देता है. वह व्यक्ति की सीख ख़त्म कर देता है. हर किसी का सबकुछ नष्ट कर देता है. दुःख से बड़ा कोई शत्रु नही है.
name: रामायण

quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: बच्चों के लिए उस कर्ज को चुकाना मुश्किल है जो उनके माता-पिता ने उन्हें बड़ा करने के लिए किया है.
name: रामायण

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
name: Milton Berle

quote: गलती करना मानव का स्वभाव है, ऐसा कोई भी नहीं है जिसने कभी कोई गलती ना की हो.
name: रामायण

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
name: Mark Twain

quote: अपना जीवन त्याग देना कोई अच्छा फल नहीं देता, जीना जारी रखना आनंद और प्रसन्नता का मार्ग है.
name: रामायण

quote: The World is my country, all mankind are my brethren, and to do good is my religion.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: ज़िन्दगी तो अपने दम पर ही जी जाती हे … दूसरो के कन्धों पर तो सिर्फ जनाजे उठाये जाते हैं
name: भगत सिंह

quote: औरत ही एक मात्र प्राणी है जिससे मैं ये जानते हुए भी की वो मुझे चोट नहीं पहुंचाएगी, डरता हूँ
name: अब्राहम लिंकन

quote: जिस व्यक्ति ने कभी गलती नहीं कि उसने कभी कुछ नया करने की कोशिश नहीं की.
name: अल्बर्ट आइंस्टीन

quote: ऐसे लोग हैं जिन्हें पूँजीवाद पसंद नहीं है, और ऐसे लोग भी हैं जिन्हें पर्सनल कम्प्यूटर्स पसंद नहीं है . पर ऐसा कोई भी नहीं है जिसे पी सी पसंद हो और वो माइक्रोसोफ्ट को पसंद ना करता हो।
name: बिल गेट्स

quote: बीस साल की उम्र में इंसान अपनी इच्छा से चलता है,तीस में बुद्धि से और चालीस में अपने अनुमान से
name: बेंजामिन  फ्रैंकलिन

quote: जिस प्रकार एक सूखे पेड़ को अगर आग लगा दी जाये तो वह पूरा जंगल जला देता है, उसी प्रकार एक पापी पुत्र पुरे परिवार को बर्वाद कर देता है
name: चाणक्य

quote: लम्बे समय तक नाराज़ रहने के लिए ज़िन्दगी बहुत छोटी है
name: इलोन मस्क

quote: बंधुओं ! हम मौत को बुरा नहीं कहते, यदि हम जानते कि वास्तव में मरा कैसे जाता है
name: श्री गुरु नानक देव

quote: सबसे बड़ा धोखा जो लोगों को मिलता है वो उनकी खुद की राय के कारण होता है।
name: लिओनार्दो दा विंची

quote: एक मकान तब तक घर नहीं बन सकता जब तक उसमे दिमाग और शरीर दोनों के लिए भोजन और भभक ना हो
name: बेंजामिन  फ्रैंकलिन

quote: शिखर तक पहुँचने के लिए ताकत चाहिए होती है, चाहे वो माउन्ट एवरेस्ट का शिखर हो या आपके पेशे का।
name: अब्दुल कलाम

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him
name: David Brinkley

quote: I can’t give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time
name: Herbert Bayard Swope

quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I’m a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn’t have the heart to let him down
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Love is a serious mental disease
name: Plato

quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure… but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter
name: Francis Chan

quote: It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities
name: J.K Rowling

quote: If you want to be happy, be
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up
name: Thomas A. Edision

quote: The opposite of love is not hate; it’s indifference
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us
name: Helen Keller

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do
name: Mark Twain

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying
name: Stephen King

quote: Education is the manifestation of perfection already in a man
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: After all, our Killers are our …Brothers!!??
name: Bal Gangadhara Tilak

quote: No religion has mandated killing others as a requirement for its sustenance or promotion
name: Dr.A.P.J.Abdul Kalam

quote: The biggest problem in the world today is not poverty or disease but the lack of love and charity and the feeling of being unwanted
name: Mother Teresa

quote: No real change in history has ever been achieved by discussions
name: Subhash chandra bose

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Confucius

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
name: Walt Disney

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
name: Confucius

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear
name: George Addair

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny
name: C.S. Lewis

quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine
name: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get up
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do
name: Brian Tracy

quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going
name: Chantal Sutherland

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
name: Les Brown

quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you
name: Les Brown

quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed
name: Bob Riley

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Nature Is The Dependency, We Are The Dependents So Value The Nature Otherwise It Won't Value Us
name: Abhishek Baghel

quote: Simplicity Is The Curse In Kalyuga By Which I am Suffering Of
name: Abhishek Baghel

quote: Death Is The Real Truth Not Life, So Start Something and Finish It.
name: Abhishek Baghel

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone, and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone, and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode
name: Chanakya

quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place – that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have the perseverance to realize the great life
name: Dr. A.P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life – think of it, dream of it, and live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature – trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon, and the sun, how they move in silence… We need silence to be able to touch souls
name: Mother Teresa

quote: One individual may die for an idea, but that idea will, after his death, incarnate itself in a thousand lives
name: Subhash Chandra Bose

quote: Life is lived on its own. Other’s shoulders are used only at the time of the funeral
name: Bhagat Singh

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Action is no less necessary than thought to the instinctive tendencies of the human frame
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become
name: Gautama Buddha

quote: Political tyranny is nothing compared to social tyranny and a reformer who defies society is a more courageous man than a politician who defies government
name: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: The tree laden with fruits always bends low. If you wish to be great, be lowly and meek
name: Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa

quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Arise, Awake and Stop not until the goal is reached
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: You must be the change you want to see in the world
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: No one would starve in independent India. Its grain would not be exported. Cloth would not be imported by it. Its leaders would not use a foreign language and finding justice in it would be neither costly nor difficult
name: Sardar Patel
